alert.note: Alert for Duval; Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 7:19AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Duval and west central Jim Wells Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 718 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Benavides, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alice, San Diego, Benavides, Alice Acres, Palito Blanco and San Jose. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 672 and 674. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
